category.name: Integration.CATIA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CATIA_manage_concurent_V5_V6_session
preference.preference_description: This preference allow TcIC to handle case where client machine works with both CATIA V5 & CATIA V6 (3DEXPERIENCE) started at the same time or with multiple CATIA V5 sessions. Recommendation when multiple CATIA sessions are running is to set this preference to True. Possible values: - False: (Default) Do not management multiple CATIA sessions - True: Manage multiple CATIA sessions
